## Setup

```{python}
#| label: imports

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import statsmodels.api as sm

```

```{python}
#| label: data

# data path
path = '../../../data/'
file_name = 'deprivation.csv'

# import data
df = pd.read_csv(f"{path}{file_name}")

```

```{python}
#| label: data_summary

# data summary
df.info()
df.describe()
df.head()
```

## EDA

```{python}
#| label: deprivation-plot

# imd
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(9,6))
sns.scatterplot(x='life_expectancy', y='imd_score', data=df)
sns.despine()
plt.show()

```

## Linear Regression

```{python}
#| label: model

# create model
model = sm.OLS.from_formula('life_expectancy ~ imd_score', data=df)

# fit model
results = model.fit()

# print summary
print(results.summary())

```
